title: Telnet Vision Write Function
description:
TN_SC_WRITE_C is at the given coordinates Iin_Y, Iin_Y 

Ist_STRING the text with the color of Iby_ATTR. The text is adapted before 

output on the length Iin_LENGTH, and by Iin_OPTION, the text position is 

determined.

Iin_OPTION

0 = right fll with spaces eg 'TEST '

1 = left fll with blanks eg ' TEST '

2 = center and fll with blanks eg ' TEST '
name: TN_SC_WRITE_C

input.name: Iin_LENGTH
input.description: Length to which the text will be adjusted

input.name: Iin_OPTION
input.description: Option for text positioning: 0 for right, 1 for left, 2 for center

in/out.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
in/out.description: Screen object that may be modified by the function
